name: Decentralized Minting
description: Decentralized Minting (DMINT) of Atomicals NFT Collections is a provably fair way to launch NFT collectibles. Automated "First is First" approach to claiming images and any file. Artists and Creators configure their collection and use Bitwork to allow users to select and mint the items they want. "First is First" approach to claiming images in a collection. By using Bitwork and mint_height it is a provable way to deploy a collection with no premine and pre-allocation. It is peer-to-peer between Creators and their Users.
